cards.name: W.C.Duck
cards.text: Cupcake ipsum dolor. Sit amet I love bonbon* bear claw tootsie roll jelly.* I love chocolate ice cream* chupa chups I love. Gummi bears I love wafer marzipan jujubes sweet tootsie roll bear claw.
